articles.title: Do you have Bitcoin? Be aware of the tax consequences of selling your investment

articles.summary: The tax implications of Bitcoin ownership and other cryptocurrencies depends on how seriously an investor pursues and manages their purchase. Most Australian Bitcoin investors are using online exchanges to buy and sell already created Bitcoins. If they realise a gain on the sale of Bitcoin within a year of the purchase, the gain will be fully included in the investor's taxable income for the year the sale took place. If the sale takes place more than a year after purchase the investor will qualify for a capital gains tax discount.

articles.title: Do you have Bitcoin? Here's why you need to include it on your tax return
articles.author: Christina Allen
articles.summary: The tax implications of Bitcoin ownership depends on how seriously an investor pursues and manages their purchase. Most Australian Bitcoin investors are using online exchanges to buy and sell already created Bitcoins.
